title: nitrobetting
author: nitrobetting
created_time: August 06, 2022, 03:06:56 AMLast edit: September 10, 2022, 02:09:42 AM by nitrobetting
content: JOIN THE EXCLUSIVE COMMUNITY NFL SURVIVOR POOL!Football season means the NFL Survivor Pool on Nitrobetting is back!We’re inviting our followers to an EXCLUSIVE NFL Survivor Community Pool where a 0.05 BTC GTD prize is up for grabs! Simply reply to this thread and share your experience about Nitrogen Sports’ NFL Survivor Pools in previous years (if you’re a long-time Nitro member) or share what you expect for the new NFL season (if you’re a new member on Nitrobetting!) and you’re in!Don’t forget to include your Nitrobetting ID so we can add you to the exclusive list!New to Survivor Pool? Read our guide first. Join other Survivor Pools by picking pools here.Think you got what it takes? Bring that gridiron knowledge and win bitcoin!  RULES and GUIDELINESMembers ranked as "NEWBIES" are disqualified to joinThe last chance to enter is August 31, 2022 @ 11:59 PM EST.Only one entry per user for Nitrobetting’'s NFL Survivor Community Pool; however, you can still join other paid pools and the main Free Pool. Only replies in THIS thread will be considered. Replies must include the Nitrobetting ID (Nitrobetting ID) and the required short post about NFL Survivor/NFL. All Nitro IDs will be added to the pool manually. If qualified, expect your entry to be added within 3-5 days from the time of your post. You will only see the secret pool when you are registered. Prizes in the Community Pool will be paid in Bitcoin (with a 3x Rollover requirement) at nitrobetting.eu.  Previously banned players will not be allowed to join. The NFL Survivor Community Pool will include all qualified users from Nitro’s social media pages on Facebook, Twitter, Reddit, and Bitcoin Talk.
